nodes.bodyText:
Can't really understand what's going on here.
We multiply by 1,000,000 a millisecond unit and add it as a nanosecond?
(it would probably make sense if we divided instead of multiply, but then why not just do now.plus(resyncPeriodInMillis, ChronoUnit.MILLIS))
